results.title: Due Colonoscopy
results.provenance: The U.S. Preventive Services Task Force (USPSTF) recommends screening for colorectal cancer using high-sensitivity fecal occult blood testing, sigmoidoscopy, or colonoscopy beginning at age 50 years and continuing until age 75 years. [source: http://www.cdc.gov/cancer/colorectal/basic_info/screening/guidelines.htm]
results.details: Patient John Smith is due for a colonoscopy.
